title.narrative: National Decentralized Planning and Finance Program

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to improve the capacity of local government to manage public financial resources for district development in a participatory and transparent manner.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Economy and Finance (formerly Ministry of Planning and Development)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :ARTICLE V, Sec. 5.01 (a) | Description :The Memorandum of Understanding has been executed and delivered onbehalf of all the parties to it, and all conditions precedent toits effectiveness have been fulfilled. | Due Date :09-Aug-2010
Finance Agreement :ARTICLE V, Sec. 5.01 (b) | Description :The Recipient has engaged the financial management expert and completedthe training | Due Date :30-Aug-2010

Finance Agreement :ARTICLE V, Sec. 5.01 (c) | Description :The Recipient has adopted the Project Implementation Manual referred toin Section I.A.3 of Schedule 2 to the Agreement | Due Date :31-Aug-2010
Finance Agreement :ARTICLE V, Sec. 5.01 (d) | Description :The Recipient has updated the baseline data | Due Date :30-Aug-2010
Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 1, SECTION I, B, 2, (a), (b), (c) | Description :Simplified District Formats | Due Date :30-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 1, SECTION I, B, 3, (a), (b), (c) | Description :District-level Infrastructure Operations and Operationand Maintenance Strategy prepared and adopted by all districts | Due Date :30-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 1, SECTION I, B, 4, (a), (b), (c) | Description :District-level Core Manuals prepared and adopted byall districts | Due Date :30-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 1, SECTION I, B, 5, (a) | Description :District-level Safeguards Frameworks prepared and adopted by alldistricts | Due Date :30-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 2, SECTION I, B, 5, (b) | Description :Evaluation of the application by districts of the Environmentaland Social Safeguards Management Framework | Due Date :30-Jun-2013
Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 2, SECTION I, B, 6, (a) | Description :First study of the measures taken by its districts to ensurecommunity participation | Due Date :30-Jun-2013
Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 2, SECTION I, B, 6, (a) | Description :Second study of the measures taken by its districts to ensurecommunity participation | Due Date :31-Mar-2015
Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 2, SECTION I, B, 8, (a) | Description :Evaluation of the impact to date of the technical assistance(TA) | Due Date :30-Jun-2013

title.narrative: Districts with annual PESOD execution reports publicly displayed and discussed in District Councils in accordance with guidelines
Degree of progress in developing and rolling out the Performance Monitoring System for decentralized planning and finance (SMPD)
Timely submission of consolidated Project AWPB and monitoring reports
N-DPFP web page in the government (MPD) portal updated at least 3 times per year with Best Practices and District Performance reports
Districts that use at least 3 established Best Practices in decentralized planning and finance
Districts that have received all final and all available updated of district process dossiers and implementation manuals
Districts that report on District Performance in decentralized planning and finance through SMPD
Cumulative number of provincial trainers recognized by the pertinent Ministries in relevant areas of NDPFP

Proportion of procurement contracts in public works executed by the districts with post review processes (“anotação”) submitted to the Administrative Tribunal or prior approval ("visto") granted by AT
Districts with their accounts audited by the Administrative Court
Districts that inform their local consultative councils about the results of internal and external control exercises
Districts with an operational plan (PESOD) approved and disseminated in accordance with (selected criteria in) established planningguidelines
Districts with financial processes closed in e-SISTAFE at the end of the financial year
Districts with an annual increase of at least 10% in local revenue collection and registration in e-SISTAFE
District Councils that operate in accordance with (selected criteria in) current legislation
Districts that submitted their annual financial statements to the Administrative Tribunal in accordance with current legislation
Districts with more than 90% budget execution of their district operational plan (PESOD)
Number of local government technical staff strengthening the intervention areas of the Program, integrated in civil service personnel system and payroll
